Module jBomberman
Package view

Class DecoratedAccount

java.lang.Object
model.Account
view.DecoratorAccount
view.DecoratedAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Account>
public class DecoratedAccount extends DecoratorAccount implements Serializable
It's an Account (from Model) in which is wrapped an AvatarAccount (to represent it in the View) and a Color.
See Also:
